name: City Taxi Car Driver Sim-ulator
description:
Come on and get behind the wheel of some of the best taxi cabs and pick up tourists to take them to see all the sights of the city. Unlock better, faster vehicles to get the best four star rating for each ride! Collect stars and other collectibles spread all around the hug environment, go to some extreme heights and crazy stunts to find all collectibles!

Don't feel like rushing? Take your time to drive around and explore every spot of the map and enjoy the view. Head off road for hidden collectibles to get that special taxi you so desire!

Burn rubber in a lighting fast Bugatti Veyron, look stylish with the top down in the BMW Z4 convertible taxi, wreck havoc in a 3 ton armored Humvee, the choice is yours. Choose the taxi you prefer and go and have fun! Play it your way!

Completion is must for you? Go back and retry any mission without waiting for age until you nail that route and get that 4 gold star rating!

Game Features:
-Massive open world driving perfectly made for exploration
-Unlockable vehicles, each unique with personalised car stats
-Live A.I traffic taht react and respond to collisions
-Realistic car driving physics
-Full vehicle damage, witness each bump and scrape whilst driving
-Plenty of hidden areas
-Destructible environment
-Instant mission replay
